languages.text: "Но пока мы с вами предавались... я бы даже сказал, погрязали в азарте охоты на лицемеров — Звездное Сиятельство воспаряли мыслями к долгу вопреки пестрой суете забав. Это ли не истинная победа воли над прихотью? Мейв, преподнеси же наш дар звездно{mf|му|й} гост{mf|ю|ье}!"
languages.translation_comment: FW_FakeGovernor. Анимация "Лидзи подходит и дарит подарок" В конце куя выдается айтем FW_Prize_HideAndSeekBig_item — предлагаю выдать биг, чтобы губер сильнее расшаркивался перед неподкупным и равнодушным РТ. ПОКАЗЫВАЕТСЯ ЕСЛИ НЕ ТРАТИЛИ НИ ОДНОГО ЗАРЯДА ИНФОПЕЧАТИ ИЛИ СКИПНУЛИ ОБЖ4

traits.locale_text: "Но пока мы с вами предавались... я бы даже сказал, погрязали в азарте охоты на лицемеров — Их Сиятельство воспаряли мыслями к долгу вопреки пестрой суете забав. Это ли не истинная победа — головы над серцем, воли над прихотью? Лидзи, преподнеси же наш дар звездному гостю!"

languages.translation_comment: FW_FakeGovernor. Анимация "Лидзи подходит и дарит подарок" В конце куя выдается айтем FW_Prize_HideAndSeekBig_item — предлагаю выдать биг, чтобы губер сильнее расшаркивался перед неподкупным и равнодушным РТ. ПОКАЗЫВАЕТСЯ ЕСЛИ НЕ ТРАТИЛИ НИ ОДНОГО ЗАРЯДА ИНФОПЕЧАТИ ИЛИ СКИПНУЛИ ОБЖ4

languages.text: "However, while most of us were indulging — I would even say wallowing — in the thrill of the Impostor Hunt, {mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness turned {mf|his|her} lofty thoughts away from these motley diversions and toward duty. How can this be anything but a true victory of will over whim? Maive, come and present our gift to our celestial guest!"
languages.original_text: "Но пока мы с вами предавались... я бы даже сказал, погрязали в азарте охоты на лицемеров — Звездное Сиятельство воспаряли мыслями к долгу вопреки пестрой суете забав. Это ли не истинная победа воли над прихотью? Мейв, преподнеси же наш дар звездно{mf|му|й} гост{mf|ю|ье}!"

traits.locale_text: "However, while most of us were indulging — I would even say wallowing! — in the thrill of the Impostor Hunt, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} turned {mf|his|her} lofty thoughts from these motley diversions to duty. How can it be anything but a true victory of will over whim? Lidzy, come and present our gift to our celestial guest!"

"However, while most of us were indulging — I would even say wallowing! — in the thrill of the Impostor Hunt, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} turned {mf|his|her} lofty thoughts from these motley diversions to duty. How can it be anything but a true victory of will over whim? Lidzy, come and present our gift to our celestial guest!"

"However, while most of us were indulging — I would even say wallowing — in the thrill of the Impostor Hunt, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} turned {mf|his|her} lofty thoughts away from these motley diversions and toward duty. How can this be anything but a true victory of will over whim? Lidzy, come and present our gift to our celestial guest!"

"However, while most of us were indulging — I would even say wallowing — in the thrill of the Impostor Hunt, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} turned {mf|his|her} lofty thoughts away from these motley diversions and toward duty. How can this be anything but a true victory of will over whim? Lidzy, come and present our gift to our celestial guest!"

"However, while most of us were indulging — I would even say wallowing — in the thrill of the Impostor Hunt, {mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness turned {mf|his|her} lofty thoughts away from these motley diversions and toward duty. How can this be anything but a true victory of will over whim? Maive, come and present our gift to our celestial guest!"

"However, while most of us were indulging — I would even say wallowing — in the thrill of the Impostor Hunt, {mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness turned {mf|his|her} lofty thoughts away from these motley diversions and toward duty. How can this be anything but a true victory of will over whim? Maive, come and present our gift to our celestial guest!"

languages.text: “不过，我们绝大多数人都在享受寻找冒牌货的乐趣，甚至可以说是完全沉浸其中。然而，我们来自上界的大人却没有被这些杂七杂八的消遣分散精力，{mf|他|她}依然专心致志地履行着自己的职责。这是意志与责任感的胜利，有谁又能否认呢？来吧，梅芙，把我们准备的礼物献给来自上界的贵客吧！”
languages.original_text: "However, while most of us were indulging — I would even say wallowing — in the thrill of the Impostor Hunt, {mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness turned {mf|his|her} lofty thoughts away from these motley diversions and toward duty. How can this be anything but a true victory of will over whim? Maive, come and present our gift to our celestial guest!"

traits.locale_text: “不过，我们绝大多数人都在享受寻找冒牌货的乐趣，甚至可以说是完全沉浸其中。然而，我们来自上界的大人却没有被这些杂七杂八的消遣分散精力，{mf|他|她}依然专心致志地履行着自己的职责。这是意志与责任感的胜利，有谁又能否认呢？来吧，梅芙，把我们准备的礼物献给来自上界的贵客吧！”

languages.text: «Sin embargo, mientras la mayoría nos entreteníamos (incluso diría que nos regodeábamos) con la emoción de la Caza del Impostor, Su Excelencia Celestial apartaba sus elevados pensamientos del vulgar ocio y lo centraba en su deber. ¿Qué otra cosa puede ser esto sino el triunfo de la voluntad sobre la frivolidad? ¡Maive, acércate y entrega nuestro obsequio a {mf|nuestro|nuestra} invitada celestial!».
languages.original_text: "However, while most of us were indulging — I would even say wallowing — in the thrill of the Impostor Hunt, {mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness turned {mf|his|her} lofty thoughts away from these motley diversions and toward duty. How can this be anything but a true victory of will over whim? Maive, come and present our gift to our celestial guest!"

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, mientras la mayoría nos entreteníamos (incluso diría que nos regodeábamos) con la emoción de la Caza del Impostor, Su Excelencia Celestial apartaba sus elevados pensamientos del vulgar ocio y lo centraba en su deber. ¿Qué otra cosa puede ser esto sino el triunfo de la voluntad sobre la frivolidad? ¡Maive, acércate y entrega nuestro obsequio a {mf|nuestro|nuestra} invitada celestial!».

languages.text: "Bu arada birçoğumuz Taklitçi Avı'nın heyecanına kapılmışken, hatta avın içinde umarsızca debelenirken Semavi Efendimiz, yüce düşüncelerini bu çeşitli eğlencelerden uzaklaştırmayı başarıp vazifesine odaklandı. Bu, iradenin heves karşısında elde ettiği büyük bir zaferi değildir de nedir? Maive, gel. Armağanımızı semavi misafirimize sun!"
languages.original_text: "However, while most of us were indulging — I would even say wallowing — in the thrill of the Impostor Hunt, {mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness turned {mf|his|her} lofty thoughts away from these motley diversions and toward duty. How can this be anything but a true victory of will over whim? Maive, come and present our gift to our celestial guest!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu arada birçoğumuz Taklitçi Avı'nın heyecanına kapılmışken, hatta avın içinde umarsızca debelenirken Semavi Efendimiz, yüce düşüncelerini bu çeşitli eğlencelerden uzaklaştırmayı başarıp vazifesine odaklandı. Bu, iradenin heves karşısında elde ettiği büyük bir zaferi değildir de nedir? Maive, gel. Armağanımızı semavi misafirimize sun!"

languages.text: 「しかしながら、私たちのほとんどは気ままに振る舞っていた―快楽にふけっていたとさえ言えるでしょう―『偽者探し』のスリルの中で。天の閣下は、気高い思考を雑多な気晴らしから、責務の方に向けられました。きまぐれに対する意志の勝利以外の何ものでもありません。メイヴ、賞品を天のお客人にお渡ししろ！」
languages.original_text: "However, while most of us were indulging — I would even say wallowing — in the thrill of the Impostor Hunt, {mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness turned {mf|his|her} lofty thoughts away from these motley diversions and toward duty. How can this be anything but a true victory of will over whim? Maive, come and present our gift to our celestial guest!"

traits.locale_text: 「しかしながら、私たちのほとんどは気ままに振る舞っていた―快楽にふけっていたとさえ言えるでしょう―『偽者探し』のスリルの中で。天の閣下は、気高い思考を雑多な気晴らしから、責務の方に向けられました。きまぐれに対する意志の勝利以外の何ものでもありません。メイヴ、賞品を天のお客人にお渡ししろ！」

languages.text: « Cependant, tandis que la plupart d'entre nous s'adonnaient... je dirais même plus, se complaisaient dans cette Chasse aux imposteurs, Son Altesse Célestissime a détourné ses nobles pensées de ces divertissements hétéroclites pour se consacrer entièrement à son devoir. N'est-ce pas là une véritable victoire de la volonté sur le caprice ? Maive, venez donc présenter notre cadeau à notre céleste hôte ! »
languages.original_text: "However, while most of us were indulging — I would even say wallowing — in the thrill of the Impostor Hunt, {mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness turned {mf|his|her} lofty thoughts away from these motley diversions and toward duty. How can this be anything but a true victory of will over whim? Maive, come and present our gift to our celestial guest!"

traits.locale_text: « Cependant, tandis que la plupart d'entre nous s'adonnaient... je dirais même plus, se complaisaient dans cette Chasse aux imposteurs, Son Altesse Célestissime a détourné ses nobles pensées de ces divertissements hétéroclites pour se consacrer entièrement à son devoir. N'est-ce pas là une véritable victoire de la volonté sur le caprice ? Maive, venez donc présenter notre cadeau à notre céleste hôte ! »

languages.text: "Aber während die meisten von uns den Nervenkitzel der Jagd auf den Hochstapler genossen und sich förmlich darin gesuhlt haben, hat {mf|seine|ihre} himmlische Hoheit {mf|seine|ihre} erhabenen Gedanken nicht auf diese bunte Ablenkung gerichtet, sondern allein auf die Pflicht. Wie kann das etwas anderes sein als ein wahrer Sieg des Willens über die Verrücktheit? Maive, kommt und überreicht unserem himmlischen Gast unser Geschenk!"
languages.original_text: "However, while most of us were indulging — I would even say wallowing — in the thrill of the Impostor Hunt, {mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness turned {mf|his|her} lofty thoughts away from these motley diversions and toward duty. How can this be anything but a true victory of will over whim? Maive, come and present our gift to our celestial guest!"

traits.locale_text: "Aber während die meisten von uns den Nervenkitzel der Jagd auf den Hochstapler genossen und sich förmlich darin gesuhlt haben, hat {mf|seine|ihre} himmlische Hoheit {mf|seine|ihre} erhabenen Gedanken nicht auf diese bunte Ablenkung gerichtet, sondern allein auf die Pflicht. Wie kann das etwas anderes sein als ein wahrer Sieg des Willens über die Verrücktheit? Maive, kommt und überreicht unserem himmlischen Gast unser Geschenk!"
